oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Benjamin E. Carmichael correspondence with members of the Chattanooga Board of Education, 9 August 1965
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Carmichael, Benjamin E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Chattanooga Public Schools superintendent Benjamin Carminchael to members of the Chattanooga Board of Education regarding a recent Chattanooga Times-Free Press article that alleged Carmichael's support of an accelerated desegregation plan.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga; School integration -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tennessee); Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Mapp v. Board of Education correspondence, 1965-1967
Mapp v. Board of Education legal documents, 1965-1969
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
